programme.title: VPI: Vinnie Politan Investigates
programme.desc: Vinnie Politan takes a deep dive into the true crime stories that are captivating the world over.

programme.title: 48 Hours
programme.desc: The person responsible for the savage beating of a woman refuses to give an explanation.

programme.title: VPI: Vinnie Politan Investigates

programme.title: Judgment With Ashleigh Banfield
programme.desc: Scott Amendure thought the "Jenny Jones Show" was the perfect place to reveal to his friend Jonathan Schmitz that he had a crush on him; three days later, Schmitz shot Amendure to death.

programme.title: Judgment With Ashleigh Banfield
programme.desc: Dr. Jack Kevorkian thought it was an act of mercy to help over 130 terminally ill patients die a peaceful, pain-free death; Michigan prosecutors said it was murder and spent years trying to get a jury to agree with them.

programme.title: Judgment With Ashleigh Banfield
programme.desc: Mary Kay Letourneau, 34 year-old married schoolteacher and mother, was having sex with a 12 year old student, and the story grabbed headlines around the world; it's only the first in a series of wild revelations.

programme.title: Judgment With Ashleigh Banfield
programme.desc: Reverend Randall Foos says it was just an unfortunate accident when his car hit and killed 19-year-old Sara Casey as she rode her bicycle, but a civil suit revealed more than the eye could see, or couldn't, that turned this accident into a crime.

programme.title: The FBI Files
programme.desc: Vincent "Chin" Gigante, the alleged Genovese crime boss, was brought to justice in spite of his eccentric behavior, such as roaming Greenwich Village in his pajamas and slippers.

programme.title: The FBI Files
programme.desc: Lured by the easy wealth of the narcotics industry, some crooked cops in the Big Easy break the laws they were sworn to uphold.

programme.title: VPI: Vinnie Politan Investigates
programme.desc: Vinnie Politan takes a deep dive into the true crime stories that are captivating the world over.

programme.title: Opening Statements With Julie Grant
programme.desc: Former prosecutor Julie Grant is joined by a team of top trial attorneys and forensic experts to cover the high-stakes trials that are on the docket, and the crime cases dominating the headlines.
